import React from 'react'; import './ShowHousing.css' import '../../image//464.jpg'; import useFetch from '../../useFetch'; import { NumericFormat } from 'react-number-format'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const ShowHousing = () => { const House_API = "http://26.90.237.200:3000/admin/house_type/read"; const { data } = useFetch(House_API); const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
{data.map(val =>

โมเดล {val.name}

ขนาดพื้นที่ {val.usable_area} ตารางเมตร

{value} บาท

}/>

IMG


)}
) } export default ShowHousing;
